title: Product List with Renamed Columns
description: Create a cleaned product table with specific columns using SELECTCOLUMNS for column projection and renaming.

prompt.system: You are a DAX expert. Generate only the DAX code without any explanation or markdown formatting. Return the table expression starting with the name followed by an equals sign.
prompt.user: Create a calculated table called 'Product Catalog' that contains only the Product Name, Brand, and Category columns from the Product table. Rename 'Product Name' to 'Name' and 'Category' to 'Product Category'.
prompt.dataModelContext: You are working with a sales database. Product contains: ProductKey, Product Code, Product Name (text), Manufacturer, Brand (text), Color, Unit Price, Category (text).

expectedOutput.dax: Product Catalog = SELECTCOLUMNS(Product, "Name", Product[Product Name], "Brand", Product[Brand], "Product Category", Product[Category])
alternativeCorrect: Product Catalog = SELECTCOLUMNS(ALL(Product), "Name", Product[Product Name], "Brand", Product[Brand], "Product Category", Product[Category])

hints: SELECTCOLUMNS takes pairs of column name and expression
Column names in the result must be quoted strings
